If your file associations get messed up, try the following commands:

<code> sudo update-mime-database /usr/share/mime </code><<BR>>
<code> sudo dpkg-reconfigure shared-mime-info </code><<BR>>
<code> killall gnome-panel </code><<BR>>
<code> killall nautilus </code><<BR>>
